author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is an attempt to address issue #37290. It provides an alternative solution to the one in #37348 (FYI: @JanFSchulte).

The idea here is to solve the duplication leaving HLT producers untouched, improving instead the DQM client that uses the ad-hoc duplicate of the `PropagateToMuon` class. Solving the duplication required templating the classes `PropagateToMuonSetup` and `L1MuonMatcherAlgo` in `MuonAnalysis/MuonAssociators`. This avoids changes to all other producers using the latter utilities.

Merely technical. No changes expected.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 11634.0`.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: remove duplicate of `PropagateToMuon` class
